sentences.cn: 你能和我们合作 吗 ?

sentences.en: Her unwillingness to cooperate put me in a quandary.
sentences.cn: 她不愿合作,这使我陷入困境.

sentences.en: I advised my client to cooperate fully with the police.
sentences.cn: 我建议我的当事人要全力与警方配合。

sentences.en: I earnestly advised him to cooperate.
If you're a good fellow you cooperate.
sentences.cn: 要做个好伙伴,就要懂得合群.

sentences.en: Let's all cooperate to get the work done quickly.
sentences.cn: 让我们一起同心协力把这工作快点做完.

sentences.en: That pigheaded old man refused to cooperate with the neighbors.
sentences.cn: 那个固执的老头拒绝和邻居合作.

sentences.en: The issue is bedevilled by Smith's refusal to cooperate with us.
sentences.cn: 该问题由于史密斯拒绝跟我们合作而变为复杂.

sentences.en: The two airlines will cooperate on ticketing and schedules.
sentences.cn: 两家航空公司将在票务和航班安排上展开合作。

sentences.en: The two groups agreed to cooperate with each other.
sentences.cn: 这两个组同意相互协作。

sentences.en: They agreed to co-operate with Brazil on a programme to protect the rain forests.
sentences.cn: 他们同意和巴西合作进行一个保护热带雨林的项目。

sentences.en: They will begin to cooperate in the apprehension of these gangsters.
sentences.cn: 他们将合作捕捉这些歹徒.

sentences.en: This fully demonstrates their willingness to cooperate.
sentences.cn: 这充分表明他们愿意合作.

sentences.en: To my surprise, he refused to cooperate with us.
sentences.cn: 令我吃惊的是, 他不肯与我们合作.

sentences.en: We need to cooperate perfectly to win the game.
sentences.cn: 要想赢得比赛,我们需要密切配合.

sentences.en: Workers'leaders have expressed their willingness to cooperate.
sentences.cn: 工人领袖们表达了合作的意愿.

words.tran_cn: 合作，协作；[劳经] 协力

trans.tran_en: to work with someone else to achieve something that you both want

trans.tran_cn: 合作， 协作； 配合
trans.tran_en: to work with someone else to achieve something that you both want
